name: Phish.net
overview: Comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos using the Phish.net API
description: This plugin provides rich metadata for your Phish concert video collection by integrating with the Phish.net API. Features include comprehensive show information with setlists, community ratings from reviews, venue details, band member profiles, and multi-source image provider for venue and show-specific photos. Perfect for organizing and enriching your Phish video library with official show data, fan ratings, and beautiful imagery.

versions.changelog:
## External Link URL Fix v1.2.6

Improved external link URL format:
- Fixed URL format for better Phish.net navigation
- Uses more direct path to setlist pages (/setlists/{date}.html)
- Better user experience with improved link targeting

Update via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual install.

## External Link Fix v1.2.5

Fixed broken external links to Phish.net:
- Removed non-working Setlist, Reviews, and Venue links
- Single working Phish.net link that takes users to show page
- Cleaned up 200+ lines of unused external ID code
- Better user experience with reliable navigation

Update via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual install.

## Setlist Spacing Fix v1.2.4

Fixed Setlist Transition Spacing:
- Proper spaces after transitions (Mike's Song > I Am Hydrogen)
- Fixed comma spacing (Harry Hood > Train Song, Billy Breathes)
- Removed TrimEnd() that was removing trailing spaces
- Professional display matching expected Phish setlist formatting

What's Fixed:
- Setlist transitions now have proper spacing
- DisplayTransition property works correctly
- Clean, readable setlist format

Example Fix:
Before: Mike's Song >I Am Hydrogen >Weekapaug Groove,Harry Hood
After: Mike's Song > I Am Hydrogen > Weekapaug Groove, Harry Hood

Technical Fix:
- Removed TrimEnd() call that was stripping trailing spaces
- DisplayTransition property returns properly formatted spacing

Update via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual install.

## Text Encoding Fix v1.2.3

Fixed special character issues in show notes and setlist text.

- Show notes now display properly
- Fixed apostrophes and quotes formatting
- Added CleanText method for API responses
- Applied to all text content

Update via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manual install.

## üñºÔ∏è Plugin Image & External Links Fix v1.2.2

### üîß Plugin Image Fixes
- **Enhanced Image Methods**: Added multiple plugin image methods for better compatibility
- **GetPluginImage()**: Standard plugin image method
- **GetThumbImage()**: Thumbnail image method
- **GetLogoImage()**: Logo image method
- **Better Resource Loading**: Improved fallback between thumb.png and logo.png
- **Verified Embedded Resources**: Both images properly embedded (299KB each)

### üîó External ID Provider Fixes
- **Fixed ExternalId Interface**: Type property now returns ExternalIdMediaType? (nullable)
- **4 External Link Types**: Show, Setlist, Venue, and Reviews pages
- **Clickable Jellyfin Links**: External links now work in Jellyfin UI
- **Proper Registration**: All providers registered in DI container

### üé≠ Person Provider & Overview Improvements

- **Enhanced Overview**: Venue prominence, proper setlist formatting

### üöÄ What's New This Version

- External links to Phish.net appear under 'External Links' in movie details
- Band member information populates when processing concert videos
- Much improved overview formatting with venue at top and clean setlist layout

### üì• Installation
Update via Jellyfin plugin catalog or manually install this release. Restart Jellyfin after updating to ensure all image and provider changes take effect.

### üêõ Addresses
- Issue #14 (Plugin image missing in 2 places)
- Issue #12 (People not populating)
- Issue #13 (Overview formatting improvement)
- Issue #7 (External ID Provider for Phish.net Links)

This is a comprehensive update with major UI and functionality improvements!

## üñºÔ∏è Plugin Image Fix v1.2.1

### Bug Fix
- **Fixed Missing Plugin Images**: Plugin icon now displays correctly in all Jellyfin UI locations
- **Multi-Method Support**: Added both `GetPluginImage()` and `GetThumbImage()` methods for compatibility

## üßπ Clean Production Release v1.2.0

### Major Cleanup
- **Removed Community Rating Feature**: Eliminated all community rating code and dependencies
- **Simplified Configuration**: Removed rating-related settings and debug options
- **Cleaner Codebase**: Removed unused ReviewDto model and reviews API calls
- **Focus on Core Features**: Streamlined to essential metadata functionality

### What's Removed
- Community rating calculation and display
- Reviews fetching and processing
- Rating-related configuration options (IncludeReviews, MaxReviews, ShowRatingInTitle)
- Debug logging for rating investigation
- All rating-related documentation references

### What's Improved
- Cleaner, more maintainable codebase
- Faster metadata processing (no review API calls)
- Simplified configuration interface
- Better focus on core plugin functionality

### Core Features (Still Working Great!)
- ‚úÖ Smart title parsing for multi-night shows
- ‚úÖ Complete setlists with transitions
- ‚úÖ Venue information and metadata
- ‚úÖ Show dates, tours, and comprehensive tagging
- ‚úÖ Multi-night run detection (N1, N2, N3...)
- ‚úÖ Rich show overviews and descriptions

This is a production-ready version focused on what works best!

## üîç Raw API Response Debug v1.1.12

### Debug Enhancement
- **Added Raw JSON Response Logging**: Now logs the complete JSON response from Phish.net API
- **Field Discovery**: Will show ALL fields available in API responses
- **Missing Rating Investigation**: Helps identify if rating data exists under different field names
- **Complete API Transparency**: Shows exactly what data the API returns

### What's New
- Raw JSON logging for shows endpoints (showdate and showid)
- Truncates large responses to first 2000 characters for readability
- Shows complete API response structure to identify missing fields
- Helps determine if we're using wrong field names for rating data

### For Users
- This is a debug version to see the raw API response data
- Look for 'DEBUG Raw JSON Response for shows/showdate/1997-11-22.json'
- Will show if rating data exists under different field names
- Once we identify the correct fields, we can fix the rating issue

This will finally show us exactly what fields the Phish.net API provides!

## üîß API Endpoint Enhancement v1.1.11

### Major Enhancement
- **Added Show Details API Fallback**: Now tries `shows/showid/{id}.json` endpoint when rating data is missing
- **Dual API Strategy**: Uses both show date and show ID endpoints for comprehensive data
- **Better Rating Discovery**: Automatically attempts detailed show API if basic endpoint lacks rating
- **Enhanced Debug Logging**: Shows which endpoint provided rating data

### What's New
- New `GetShowByIdAsync` method in API client
- Automatic fallback when show date endpoint returns null ratings
- Shows exactly which API call succeeded in logs
- Uses ShowId (1252683584) to get detailed show information

### For Users
- Community ratings should now work if available in Phish.net detailed show data
- Look for 'Rating not available from show date endpoint, trying show details endpoint'
- Check logs for '‚úÖ Found rating data in detailed show endpoint' success messages
- Hampton 11/22/1997 should now get rating data if API provides it

This version tries harder to find community rating data from Phish.net!

## üêõ Debug Version v1.1.10

### Debug Enhancement
- **Added Comprehensive API Response Logging**: Now logs all show data fields returned by Phish.net API
- **Show Data Investigation**: Helps identify why community ratings are null
- **Field-by-Field Analysis**: Logs ShowId, Venue, City, State, Rating, ReviewCount, and all other fields

### Purpose
- This is a debug build to understand the API response structure
- Helps determine if rating data is missing from the API or if we're using the wrong field
- Temporary version to diagnose Hampton 11/22/1997 rating issue

### For Users
- Install this version temporarily to help diagnose rating issues
- Check logs for 'DEBUG Show Data:' entries after metadata refresh
- This will show exactly what data Phish.net API is returning

This debug version will help us fix the community rating issue permanently!

## ‚úÖ Community Rating Fix v1.1.9

### Major Fix
- **Fixed Community Ratings**: Now uses show's overall rating instead of individual review ratings
- **Correct Data Source**: Uses the 4.64/5 rating displayed on Phish.net show pages
- **Proper API Usage**: Individual reviews don't contain ratings, but show data does
- **Better Logging**: Shows exactly where rating data comes from

### What Was Wrong
- Plugin was trying to aggregate individual review ratings (which are always null)
- Should have been using the show's overall community rating from show data
- Hampton 11/22/1997 has 4.64/5 rating (>500 reviews) - now correctly displays as 9.3/10

### What's Fixed
- Community ratings now work for all shows with Phish.net ratings
- Uses the same 4.64/5 rating visible on the show's web page
- Converted properly to Jellyfin's 1-10 scale (4.64 √ó 2 = 9.28/10)
- Shows review count in logs for verification

### For Users
- Community ratings should now appear immediately after updating
- Popular shows will show ratings like 8-9/10
- Check logs for '‚úÖ Set community rating' success messages

This is the final fix for the community rating feature!

## üîç Debug Enhancement v1.1.8

### Enhanced Debugging
- **Detailed Rating Logs**: Shows sample reviews with raw/parsed ratings
- **Rating Breakdown**: Displays rating distribution (e.g., 4.0‚òÖ(3), 5.0‚òÖ(2))
- **Information-Level Logging**: Critical debug info now at INFO level
- **Clear Success/Failure Messages**: ‚úÖ/‚ùå indicators for rating calculation

### What's New
- Sample review data logged for troubleshooting

### For Users
- Check logs for 'Sample Review' entries to see rating data

This version helps diagnose community rating issues with detailed logging.

## üîß Parsing Fix v1.1.7

### Major Fix
- **Fixed Title Parsing**: Now handles processed titles like 'N2 Phish Hampton 11-22-1997'
- **Lowered Confidence Threshold**: Reduced from 0.3 to 0.25 for better parsing success
- **Enhanced Patterns**: Added specific patterns for processed titles and standard formats
- **Better Logging**: Improved debug information for parsing failures

### What's Fixed
- Plugin was rejecting valid show titles due to low parsing confidence
- Added patterns for multi-night run titles (N1, N2, N3, etc.)
- Improved recognition of standard Phish title formats
- Better error messages and debugging information

### For Users
- Shows that were previously skipped should now be processed
- Better handling of multi-night runs and processed titles
- Improved logging for troubleshooting parsing issues

See the full changelog at [GitHub](https://github.com/murphy52/jellyfin-plugin-phishnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)

## üîß Community Rating Fix v1.1.6

### Major Fix
- **Fixed Community Ratings**: Now properly checks IncludeReviews configuration
- **Enhanced Debugging**: Comprehensive logging for troubleshooting
- **Better Error Handling**: Improved review fetching with proper error handling

### What's Fixed
- Community ratings were blank due to configuration not being checked
- Reviews now only fetched when 'Include Reviews' is enabled
- Respects MaxReviews setting from configuration
- Added detailed logging for rating calculation process

### For Users
1. Update plugin via catalog or manual installation
2. Ensure 'Include Reviews' is checked in plugin settings
3. Set MaxReviews to 10-50 for better accuracy
4. Check logs for detailed community rating information

See the full changelog at [GitHub](https://github.com/murphy52/jellyfin-plugin-phishnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
